course_description: This course allows students to receive credit for study of a second language not taught at Emory while engaged in study or research abroad. Petitions for credit must be addressed to the Director of the Emory College Language Center. Repeatable for different languages and levels.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6525, Section #: 9000, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
